Module org.microbean.bean
Package org.microbean.bean

Interface AutoCloseableRegistry

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Cloneable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultAutoCloseableRegistry, DefaultCreation
public interface AutoCloseableRegistry extends AutoCloseable, Cloneable

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    AutoCloseableRegistry
    clone()
    Returns a new AutoCloseableRegistry instance that is not closed and has no register(AutoCloseable) registrations.
    void
    close()
     
    boolean

    boolean

  • Method Details

    • clone

      AutoCloseableRegistry clone()
      Returns a new AutoCloseableRegistry instance that is not closed and has no register(AutoCloseable) registrations.

      The new instance will be registered with this AutoCloseableRegistry if this AutoCloseableRegistry is not closed.

      Returns:
      a new AutoCloseableRegistry
      See Also:
      • Cloneable
      • closed()
      • register(AutoCloseable)
      Idempotency:
      All invocations of implementations of this method must return new, distinct AutoCloseable instances.
      Nullability:
      Implementations of this method must not return null.
      Thread Safety:
      Implementations of this method must be safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

    • close

      void close()
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable

    • closed

      boolean closed()

    • register

      boolean register(AutoCloseable c)
